description:
Everyone is getting ready for the upcoming Coffin group cosplay but they also have a surprise for Juju.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I Didn`t Think Anything Good Would Ever Happen to Me
Jibun no Jinsei ni wa Ii Koto Nante Okoranai to Omotteta
Pensaba que no necesitaba nada bueno en la vida
自分の人生には良い事なんて起こらないと思ってた
